If you"re curious, here are my Top 5 favorite sushi spots!
Rank Restaurant Link
1st

Oishii Sushi

My personal favorite All-You-Can-Eat and overall spot because the variety of sushi and other Japanese food is amazing despite the casual environment.

 Website
2nd

Sushi Ginza

Atmosphere was terrific, especially the Waterfall Garden. The floating Sushi Bar provides a fresh and authentic experience.

 Website
3rd

Sushi Bar Zipang

Sushi quality is excellent with big portions considering price. I recommend this place if you"re aiming for Quality over Quantity.

 Website
4th

Momo Sushi

Amazing sushi located in central Vancouver. Service is friendly and the taste of the sushi is reflective of traditional Japanese Sushi.

Website
5th

Kinjo

Quick and friendly service with a great variety of delicious items on their menu including fresh sashimi and cheap ramen!

 Website
